Text: Windows 2008 server will say its still not activated but it will .

Works for WHS 2011 as well.  Appreciate it deploert.

It works on Windows 7 Ultimate 64bit. However, after applying Windows Updates, the 30-day clock is back. When I opened the .exe again, I received a message that WAT is already removed. Moral of story....apply all Windows Updates BEFORE running the patch.

@vivatpb5776:

There is a Windows Update (KB971033) that undoes this type of activator. Before running Windows update, look for this particular entry in the list, right-click it, and hit "Hide update". You should now be able to update fine without losing your activation.
